title: Shabbar Dinner
desc: Next Shabbat ill host a top shabbat dinner in my humble residance near the old city. 3 stage meal and more stuff. Feel free to join

title: Building a Gym
desc: I am fat and lazy and the summer is almost here. Who's up for some lifting and building the perfet body for the beach? My wish is to build a gym in our small community so that everyone could enjoy. Please contact me if you feel that it's time for a change
